task_description: In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Return to the main VLC screen and then navigate to the 'Movies' folder to view available video files.
In app vlc, Add the 'Internal memory' directory to favorites and then remove it from favorites.
In app vlc, Add the 'DCIM' folder to favorites and then navigate to the favorites section to confirm that the folder has been successfully added.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Return to the main screen and navigate to the 'Browse' section to locate and play a video file stored on the device.
In app vlc, Add the 'Internal memory' folder to favorites and then navigate to the favorites section to confirm that the folder has been successfully added.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Play the video file named 'ioBB_scene_16_ra' located in the video list.
In app vlc, Add the 'Recordings' folder and the 'Music' folder to the playlist, then navigate to the playlist and start playing the added files.
In app vlc, Play the 'data' folder located in Internal memory > Android using the VLC media player.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Remove the 'DCIM' folder from the favorites list in the VLC app.
In app vlc, Navigate to the 'Music' folder within the internal memory and play the music file located there.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Check if there are any media files in the 'Documents' folder within the internal memory. If the folder is empty, return to the previous screen.
In app vlc, Scan the 'Recordings' folder for new media files using the 'Scan this folder' option from the menu.
In app vlc, Dismiss all the video player tips by clicking 'Got it' and then 'NEXT' until all tips are dismissed, then close the tips by clicking the 'X' button.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Include the internal memory in the media library preferences to allow VLC to scan for media files within the internal storage.
In app vlc, Watch the video 'ioBB_scene_16_raw' and dismiss the tutorial by clicking 'Got it' after the video starts playing.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Navigate through all the video player tips by repeatedly clicking the 'NEXT' button until the tips are exhausted, then exit the tips screen.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Navigate to the 'Download' folder within the internal memory and play all media files located there.
In app vlc, Add a custom path to the VLC media player by clicking the three dots icon, selecting "Add a custom path", and then entering the desired path in the dialog box.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Navigate to the 'Browse' tab to locate and play a media file stored on the device.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Add the 'Android' folder located in 'Internal memory' to favorites for quick access.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Browse the 'Internal memory' to locate and play a specific video file.
In app vlc, Remove the 'Internal memory' folder from favorites.
In app vlc, Add the 'media' folder located in 'Browser > Internal memory > Android' to a new playlist.
In app vlc, Navigate to the 'data' folder within the 'Android' folder to view its contents.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Open the 'Music' folder, then open the '.thumbnails' folder to view its contents.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Navigate to the 'Android' folder, then navigate to the 'data' folder, and then search for a specific file named 'example.txt'.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Scroll through the list of available storage options and select the SD card to include its media files in the VLC media library.
In app vlc, Go to medialibrary preferences to add media files to the VLC app.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Navigate to the 'Audio' tab and then go to 'MEDIALIBRARY PREFERENCES' to adjust the settings.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Navigate to the 'Movies' folder within the internal storage and play the first video file found there.
In app vlc, Task-Oriented: Navigate to the 'Download' folder within the internal memory and play the video file named 'funny_video.mp4' if it exists.
